attributes.title: NEVER AGAIN ğŸ‘‚ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ƒğŸ‘ğŸ‘‚
attributes.review: I heard about this app from my yee howdy cousin and he told me it would change my life. BIGGEST LIE EVER. All I wanted was to pay my respects to our wonderful president  but I kept getting pop up adds from Trumpâ€™s personal tanning salon. They even started sending me flyers in the MAIL. I am disgusted at this appâ€™s violation of personal privacy. Before I knew it I was getting spammed with emails and voice messages asking me to donate to a fund I believe was called keepthetrumpets.orange. One time a middle aged women SHOWED UP AT MY HOUSE asking me for money on behalf of this nasty campaign. I was horrified. Do NOT get this app it is a waste of time and all theyâ€™re doing is trying to steal your money for Trumpâ€™s personal beauty care routine. I canâ€™t believe my beloved dictator would ever promote such a despicable piece of garbage.
